structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
ORGANIZATION AND GOVERNMENT OF CITIES OF THE FIRST CLASS

law.text: The board of aldermen shall elect from its members a president, and shall elect from its members a president pro tem when the president is absent. The board of aldermen shall elect a clerk, and may elect a sergeant at arms.
law.history: Amended 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 157, sec. 1, effective January 1, 1990. -- Created 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 243, sec. 6.
